JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are moving our IT operations into containers at Azure and are looking for an experienced cloud operations engineer that can help us in the journey – but also help us define the route we take. Are you an ambitious and curious team player maybe even with team lead aspirations then do contact us.

Digizuite is a rapidly growing DAM company that helps global enterprises manage their digital content – and recently listed on Nasdaq First North. We proudly serve some of the world's most recognized brands. Digizuite is an international company, and you will join us in our headquarters in Odense, Denmark.

What makes you the right person?

Ideally you have solid experience with both

  • our current technologies, here we operate an infrastructure based on Windows Servers running in VMs hosted in Azure with SQL backend, and
  • knowledge and experience with day-to-day operations of a multi-tenant architecture, based on containers and managed services which will be our future.

You should be comfortable with many of the following:

  • Windows and Azure tools and technologies including e.g. ARM templates
  • SQL Server – administration and writing T-SQL
  • Monitoring environments with Grafana, Azure tools, Pingdom or similar
  • Management of Windows and application updates
  • Scripting repetitive tasks using e.g. PowerShell
  • Configuration of SSO/AD/ADFS, firewalls, CDNs
  • Processes based on ITIL – maybe even a certification
  • And for the future: Docker containers, Kubernetes, Terraform, document DB, V-Net…

Your role

You will be a key player in our operational setup with the following responsibilities:

  • Setting up environments and keeping them updated
  • Setting up automated monitoring and taking actions to proactively ensure high availability
  • Participate in handling incidents (if the occur)
  • Monitor and tune the hosting costs
  • Leadership skills is a plus as the team will grow

Work conditions

  • Permanent position
  • Competitive salary with pension, health insurance and six weeks of vacation
  • Informal and agile work environment
  • Cool office facilities in central Odense
  • Lunch, fruit, coffee, tea, Friday bar etc.
  • Flexible work environment with focus on life balance and with the possibility of working from home up to three days per week

About Digizuite

Digizuite is a digital asset management software that allows marketers, sales executives, and other teams across the organization to get instant access to approved brand assets. Fortune500 companies and brand leaders use Digizuite™ Media Manager as a self-service platform that enables a single source of truth for all digital content and helps enhance collaboration internally and externally. Digizuite™ Media Manager is also available as an app, empowering individuals to search and find updated logos and other relevant product materials on the go when they need them and from the device of their choice.
